text: Anante Juda vahe'mo'za amanage hu'za hugahaze. Tagra nahanigeta amarera maniteta hugahune? Erinketa vuta hankave vihuma me'nea kumatamimpi vuta umanineta anampi frisanune. Na'ankure Ra Anumzana tagri Anumzamofo avufima kumi'ma hu'nona agafare, frigahaze huno avuataga zana timpi anteno tamigeta neneta fri'za nehune hu'za hugahaze.
